review: Azmacort (triamcinolone):I was put on Qvar and now Pulmicort. I am having terrible coughing spells many times per day. Azmacort had completely stopped these episodes. Neither Qvar nor Pulmicort are helping me.

Kenalog-40 (triamcinolone):Really helps for lung constriction, but the side effects are staggering. Within forty eight hours I was shaking uncontrollably, face red, felt like my heart was going to jump out of my chest, face turned into steroid "moon pie", sweating and cannot sleep. Breathing is more important, but this is a ride I wish I could get off of.
Azmacort (triamcinolone):This works!  Why was it not reformulated to change the carrier to comply?  Dr. has prescribed others - they don't work, and I get side effects.
My son has been receiving Kenalog for over a year now and we have no side effects so far and it has brought his asthma under control.
